name: OhioHairDiva Pre-order Virgin Extension
description:
We can accommodate your hair needs in Brazilian Indian Mongolian Cambodian European Peruvian Malaysian. We have grade 5A unprocessed virgin extension in curly, straight, bodywave, loose wave and kinky curl. 
Inches range from 12"-36" bundles
                            10"-20" closures
If you do not see what you need don't hesitate to email us at Ohiohairdiva@gmail.com or for idmediate response please text our text line at 330-559-7133

name: Any texture GRADE AAAAA
description:
If you are looking for extremely gorgeous hair that is always soft and beautiful you've found it! You will love the body and natural movement of this high quality human hair. Since the cuticles are intact and go in the same direction, the hair has a beautiful natural luster that you don't see on other brands. Also, the cuticles protect the hair and prevent tangling, giving you long-lasting soft hair. This hair is the pinnacle of human hair extensions. Perfect for your next sew-in. We Guarantee it!
Please email/text us your desidered texture, you won't regret it!

name: Lace Closures
description:
Our Closure pieces are formulated using top quality 100% virgin human hair. They provide a natural free style look full of body and shine. It is perfect for those desiring a natural part on top of their weave or a natural looking hairline. OhioHairDiva works hard to provide the finest quality so you experience minimal shedding and long lasting hair.
WHEN ORDERING PLEASE EMAIL US THE DESIRED TEXTURE & STYLE
 COMES IN BODY WAVE, STRAIGHT, CURLY & DEEP WAVE

PERUVIAN
MONGOLIAN
BRAZILIAN
MALAYSIAN

"QUALITY MOVES QUANITY"

name: Virgin Bundle Deals
description:
Ever wonder what makes hair extensions virgin? Virgin hair is not processed or chemically treated in any way. It is 100% natural, so there is no damage to the cuticles which protect the hair from the elements. This pure form gives the hair a healthy, vibrant look you can see and feel. Our hair is hand-selected for quality assurance. Virgin hair extensions are naturally soft and beautiful. Great care is taken so that all the cuticles run in the same direction to prevent tangling. The end result is soft, beautiful, long lasting hair with lots of body. You will be 100% satisfied with our quality hair.
 We Guarantee it! 
"QUALITY MOVES QUANTITY"

PLEASE EMAIL IF INTERESTED IN OUR MONGOLIAN, CAMBODIAN OR INDIAN TEXTURES
